questions.question: If you are using a electric blanket, don't leave it on for the entire night
Do not force a dryer to stop before the cooling down cycle completes
Do not plug in more then three appliances' cords into the same power board
questions.help_text: Overload power board leads to big problem!!!

metadata.title: Residence Building
metadata.description: This fire safety checklist is for the buildings in the residence area. It assists you to ensure that every bedroom is fire safe
